titleStmt.title: Twelue prophetical legacies. Or Twelue sermons vpon Iacobs last will and testament recorded by Moses, in the 49. chapt. of Genesis: containing his bequests and blessings, bestowed vpon his twelue sonnes. ... Preached by Francis Rollenson, Bach: of Diuinitie, and sometimes fellow of S. Iohn the Euang: Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Rollenson, Francis, ca. 1565-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by T[homas] C[reede] for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling at the signe of the white horse, by the great north doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
